"Twin Daggers":
"Twin Daggers are melee weapons which feature quick, aggressive attacks and high air maneuverability.

The Class Skill \"Accelerator Drive\" lets you quickly close the distance to enemies by using a Normal Attack with the right timing after using a PA."

"The PA \"Vulture Moment\" closes in on an enemy while spinning, then unleashes a deadly flurry of strikes on a single target.

When used in the air, it lets you hang in the air for a long time while keeping your offense going."
